title: The Christian Horner texting scandal that split Red Bull
summary: Allegations of inappropriate behaviour made against Red Bull F1 team boss Christian Horner were dismissed twice, but heralded a series of big-name departures from the team, and ultimately his sacking

qa_pairs.question: Who is the team principal of Red Bull Racing F1 team?
What was the outcome for Christian Horner following the allegations made against him?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He was sacked from his position.
